amendatorysection.catchline: Immunization information system; immunization information; confidentiality; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Immunization information in the immunization information system established pursuant to section 71-541.01 is confidential, and unrestricted immunization information may only be accessed pursuant to rules and regulations of the Department of Health and Human Services. Unauthorized public disclosure of such confidential information is a Class III misdemeanor.
